title.rendered: Eldorado Stone Featured in Renovation Style’s Best Kitchens and Baths Issue

content.rendered: Renovation Style, a Better Homes and Gardens special interest publication, features Eldorado Stone’s Mesquite Cliffstone as part of their Best Kitchens & Baths 2011 issue. The editors recommend Eldorado Stone for its textured surface and natural color to help achieve “old-world styling.” The feature also boasts Eldorado Stone as “just right for a rustic kitchen.”

excerpt.rendered: Renovation Style, a Better Homes and Gardens special interest publication, features Eldorado Stone’s Mesquite Cliffstone as part of their Best Kitchens & Baths 2011 issue. The editors recommend Eldorado Stone for its textured surface and natural color to help achieve “old-world styling.” The feature also boasts Eldorado Stone as “just right for a rustic kitchen.”
